name: Suspicious Netsh Discovery Command
description: Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems
query: (process.command_line:/.*[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Hh]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Hh][Oo][Ww]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ww][Aa][Ll][Ll]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Gg]\ .*/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*[Rr][Uu][Ll][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*[Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee]\=[Aa][Ll][Ll].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*netsh\ * AND process.command_line:*show\ * AND process.command_line:*firewall\ * AND process.command_line:(*config\ * OR *state\ * OR *rule\ * OR *name\=all*))`
